Name: Breaking earth
About the game: Immerse yourself in the post-apocalyptic world and try to collect all the parts of the space shuttle, which are carefully guarded by mutants and fly away from a dying land, which is immersed in endless lava. Use the radar to find parts, the car to move, and shooting to destroy enemies. The game is difficult, not passable with stunning post-apocalyptic graphics. Story: The world of the future is not such a great place. Great progress requires sacrifices, they turned out to be human past and present. The air became saturated with the poison of factories, rivers with the corpses of marine life, bare forests without a single tree ... No one wanted to stay in this damned place, people reached beyond the Earth and nevertheless successfully founded a new home. What happened to the planet? Who cares, except for that miserable handful that still continued to survive among the mountains of garbage, war machines and mutants? True, only to us. It was possible to exist here, although it was difficult. When the volcanoes began throwing out ash and rivers of lava - all the outcasts of the human race were smart enough to understand, this is the end. The war for resources intensified a hundredfold, everyone wanted to assemble a ship and leave the planet, only the problem was that not everyone even in theory knew the principle of operation of this machine. From now on, this place is hellish hell. Itâ€™s useless to wait for help, all people are too scared to think and unite in groups to work together, and the technologies of the military and mutants do not even think about stopping the hunt. It is necessary to survive and ascend to such a distant 'Ark', it is not known what awaits us there ... But we are simply unable to stay.
